IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ENCOURAGE, SUPPORT, AND INVEST IN QUALITY EFFORTS THAT MEASURABLY IMPROVE HEALTH.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ENCOURAGE, SUPPORT, AND INVEST IN QUALITY EFFORTS TO IMPROVE HEALTH IN THE TRIANGLE NORTH REGION.
IRS990.Desc: THE TRIANGLE NORTH HEALTHCARE FOUNDATION,INC., A REGIONAL HEALTHCARE GRANTMAKING ORGANIZATION, AIMS TO ENHANCE THE QUALITY OF PEOPLE'S LIVES IN THE TRIANGLE NORTH REGION BY SUPPORTING PROGRAMS AND ACTIVITIES THAT IMPROVE ACCESS TO QUALITY HEALTHCARE. BY SUPPORTING THESE PROGRAMS, THE FOUNDATION RECOGNIZES AND VALUES THE LONG STANDING CIVIC AND COMMUNITY SUPPORT FOR HEALTHCARE DELIVERY IN THE RURAL COMMUNITIES OF VANCE, GRANVILLE, WARREN AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES, AND WILL FURTHER DIRECT EFFORTS THAT RESPOND TO THE SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL ADVANCES OF THE TWENTY-FIRST CENTURY WHILE EMPHASIZING A CARING AND COMPASSIONATE ENVIRONMENT.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: "FRANCES POWERS" CARDIAC HEALTH PROGRAM AND "CFFD - TOOTH CLUB" DENTAL PROGRAM.
MENTAL HEALTH THERAPY UTILIZING HORSES FOR AT RISK AND UNDERPRIVILEGED YOUTH.
HEALTH EQUITY PROGRAM FOR GRANVILLE, FRANKLIN, VANCE & WARREN COUNTY RESIDENTS.

WATER SAFETY AND YOUTH DEVELOPMENT CAMPUS PROGRAMS.
ACADEMIC SCHOLARSHIP FOR ONE STUDENT PURSUING A CAREER IN HEALTH.
SUPPORT FOR LIFELINE OUTREACH WOMEN AND CHILDREN'S SHELTER AND FOOD PANTRY.
ACADEMIC SCHOLARSHIP FOR ONE STUDENT PURSUING A CAREER IN HEALTH.
VANCE COUNTY CHILD WELL-BEING LANDSCAPE ANALYSIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: QUARTERLY PROGRESS AND FINANCIAL REPORTS ARE REQUIRED FROM THE GRANTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD MEMBERS SHALL BE DESIGNATED BY ACTION OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF HENDERSON/VANCE HEALTHCARE, INC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE 990 WILL BE DISTRIBUTED TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE THE BOARD TO REVIEW BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE BOARD. BOARD MEMBERS ANNUALLY COMPLETE AND SIGN A DISCLOSURE ABOUT ALL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION SURVEY FROM AN EXTERNAL CONSULTANT AND DECISION MADE BY BOARD FOR EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR POSITION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS FORM 990 AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST AND ON WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
